verses.arabic: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.english: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent -
verses.hausa: (Allah), Wanda gudãnar da mulki yake ga hannunSa, Ya tsarkaka, kuma Shi Mai ĩko ne a kan kome.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَٱلْحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفُورُ
verses.english: [He] who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed - and He is the Exalted in Might, the Forgiving -
verses.hausa: Shi ne Wanda Ya halitta mutuwa da rãyuwa domin Ya jarraba ku, Ya nũna wãye daga cikinku ya fi kyãwon aiki, Shi ne Mabuwãyi, Mai gafara.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا ۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِى خَلْقِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِن تَفَـٰوُتٍ ۖ فَٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٍ
verses.english: [And] who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency. So return [your] vision [to the sky]; do you see any breaks?
verses.hausa: Shi ne wanda Ya halitta sammai bakawi, ɗabaƙõƙi a kan jũna, bã za ka ga goggociya ba a cikin halittar (Allah) Mai rahama. Ka sãke dũbawa, ko za ka ga wata ɓaraka?

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ ٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَنقَلِبْ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْبَصَرُ خَاسِئًا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٌ
verses.english: Then return [your] vision twice again. [Your] vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan ka sake maimaita, dũbãwa, ganinka zai komo maka, gajiyayye, ba da ganin wata naƙasa bã.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِمَصَـٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا رُجُومًا لِّلشَّيَـٰطِينِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.english: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made [from] them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle Mun ƙawãta samar farko da fitillu, kuma Muka sanya su abin jifa ga shaiɗanu, kuma Muka yi musu tattalin azãbar Sa'ĩr.

verses.arabic: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.english: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell, and wretched is the destination.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka kafirce wa Ubangjinsu na da azãbar Jahannama, tã munana ga zamanta makõmarsu.

verses.arabic: إِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ فِيهَا سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِىَ تَفُورُ
verses.english: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.
verses.hausa: Idan an jẽfa su a cikinta, sai su ji daga gare ta wata ƙãra, tana tafasa.

verses.arabic: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلْغَيْظِ ۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلْقِىَ فِيهَا فَوْجٌ سَأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذِيرٌ
verses.english: It almost bursts with rage. Every time a company is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, "Did there not come to you a warner?"
verses.hausa: Tana kusa ta tsãge domin hushi, ko da yaushe aka jẽfa wani ɓangaren jama'a a cikinta, matsaranta na tambayar su da cewa, "Wani mai gargaɗi bai je muku ba?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٌ فَكَذَّبْنَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ كَبِيرٍ
verses.english: They will say," Yes, a warner had come to us, but we denied and said, 'Allah has not sent down anything. You are not but in great error.'"
verses.hausa: Sai su ce: "I, lalle wani mai gargaɗi ya je mana, sai muka ƙaryata shi, muka ce, 'Allah bai saukar da kome ba, bã ku cikin kõme sai ɓata babba.'"

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِىٓ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.english: And they will say, "If only we had been listening or reasoning, we would not be among the companions of the Blaze."
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Dã mun zamo muna saurãre, kõ muna da hankali, dã ba mu kasance a cikin 'yan sa'ĩr ba."

verses.arabic: فَٱعْتَرَفُوا۟ بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسُحْقًا لِّأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.english: And they will admit their sin, so [it is] alienation for the companions of the Blaze.
verses.hausa: Wato su yi iƙrãri da laifinsu. Allah Ya la'ani'yan sa'ĩr!

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
verses.english: Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward.
verses.hausa: Lalle waɗanda ke tsõron Ubangjinsu, a ɓoye, suna da wata gãfara da wani sakamako mai girma.

verses.arabic: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ ٱجْهَرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.english: And conceal your speech or publicize it; indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
verses.hausa: Kuma ku asirta maganarku ko ku bayyana ta, lalle shi, (Allah), Masani ne ga abin da ke cikin ƙirãza.

verses.arabic: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
verses.english: Does He who created not know, while He is the Subtle, the Acquainted?
verses.hausa: Ashe, wanda Ya yi halitta bã zai iya saninta ba, alhãli kuwa shi Mai tausasãwa ne, kuma Mai labartawa?

verses.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًا فَٱمْشُوا۟ فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِهِۦ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ
verses.english: It is He who made the earth tame for you - so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision - and to Him is the resurrection.
verses.hausa: Shi, (Allah), Yã sanya muku ƙasa hõrarriya, sai ku tafi cikin sãsanninta, kuma ku ci daga arzikinSa, kuma zuwa gare shi ne tãshin yake.

verses.arabic: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَمُورُ
verses.english: Do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway?
verses.hausa: Shin kõ kun amince cewa wanda ke cikin sama, bã zai iya shãfe ƙasa tãre da ku ba, sai ga ta tana mai girgiza?

verses.arabic: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ
verses.english: Or do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not send against you a storm of stones? Then you would know how [severe] was My warning.
verses.hausa: Kõ kun amincẽ cewa wanda ke cikin sama bã zai iya sako muku iskar gũguwa ba? To, zã ku san yadda (ãƙibar) gargaɗiNa take.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.english: And already had those before them denied, and how [terrible] was My reproach.
verses.hausa: Lalle, waɗanda ke gabansu sun ƙaryata (manzanni). To, yãya (ãƙibar) gargaɗiNa ta kasance?

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۭ بَصِيرٌ
verses.english: Do they not see the birds above them with wings outspread and [sometimes] folded in? None holds them [aloft] except the Most Merciful. Indeed He is, of all things, Seeing.
verses.hausa: Bã zã su yi dũbi ba zuwa ga tsuntsãye a kansu, mãsu sanwã, kuma suna fiffikãwa, bãbu mai riƙe da su sai (Allah), Mairahama? Lalle shi Mai gani ne ga dukan kõme.

verses.arabic: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ جُندٌ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُرُورٍ
verses.english: Or who is it that could be an army for you to aid you other than the Most Merciful? The disbelievers are not but in delusion.
verses.hausa: Wãne ne wanda zai zame muku mayãƙin da zai taimake ku, wanda bã (Allah) ba, Mai rahama? Kãfirai ba su a cikin kõme fãce rũɗu.

verses.arabic: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِى عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ
verses.english: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion.
verses.hausa: Wãne ne wanda zai ciyar da ku, idan (Allah) Ya riƙe arzikinSa? A'aha, sun yi zurfi cikin girman kai da tãshin hankali.

verses.arabic: أَفَمَن يَمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦٓ أَهْدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.english: Then is one who walks fallen on his face better guided or one who walks erect on a straight path?
verses.hausa: Shin, wanda ke tafiya a kife a kan fuskarsa yã fi zama a kan shiryuwa, ko kuwa wanda ke tafiya miƙe a kan hanya madaidaiciya?

verses.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.english: Say, "It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "(Allah) Shine Wanda Ya ƙaga halittarku, Ya sanya muku ji da gani da tunãni, amman kaɗan ce ƙwarai godiyarku!"

verses.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
verses.english: Say, "It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered."
verses.hausa: Kuma kace "Shi ne Ya halitta ku daga ƙasã, kuma zuwa gareShi ne ake tãshin ku."

verses.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
verses.hausa: Kuma sunã cewa, "Yaushe ne wannan alkawarin zai tabbata in dai kun kasance mãsu gaskiya ne kũ?"

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: Say, "The knowledge is only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Ilmin a wurin Allah kawai yake, kuma ni mai gargaɗi kawai ne, mai bayyana (gargaɗin)."

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةً سِيٓـَٔتْ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقِيلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
verses.english: But when they see it approaching, the faces of those who disbelieve will be distressed, and it will be said, "This is that for which you used to call."
verses.hausa: To, lokacin da suka gan ta (azãbar) a kusa, fuskokin waɗanda suka kãfirta suka mũnana, kuma aka ce (musu) wannan shi ne abin da kuka zamo kuna ƙaryatãwa.

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], "Have you considered: whether Allah should cause my death and those with me or have mercy upon us, who can protect the disbelievers from a painful punishment?"
verses.hausa: Ka ce musu "Idan Allah Ya halaka ni nĩ da wanda ke tãre da ni, ko kuma, Yã yi mana rahama, to, wãne ne zai tserar da kafirai daga wata azãba mai raɗaɗi?"

verses.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: Say, "He is the Most Merciful; we have believed in Him, and upon Him we have relied. And you will [come to] know who it is that is in clear error."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Shĩ ne Mai rahama mun yi ĩmãni da Shi, gare Shi muka dogara, saboda haka zã ku san wanda yake a cikin ɓata bayyananniya."

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَآؤُكُمْ غَوْرًا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَآءٍ مَّعِينٍۭ
verses.english: Say, "Have you considered: if your water was to become sunken [into the earth], then who could bring you flowing water?"
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Ko kun gani, idan ruwanku ya wãyi gari faƙaƙƙe, to, wãne ne zai zo muku da ruwa wani mai ɓuɓɓuga?"
